articles.content: Singapore-based IPCG holds a Capital Markets Services licence from the Monetary Authority of Singapore, and advises high-net-worth individuals and family offices. Eric Chen, a senior director at IPCG, previously managed Splendor Lights through a Limited Power of Attorney, authorising IPCG to handle Splendor Lightsâ€™ investments at Deutsche. At the time, Splendor Lightsâ€™ assets managed by IPCG at Deutsche were worth about US$42.8 million.
